pullRequest.body:
Adds three lemmas, I don't think any of them are in the library anywhere already.

```suggestion
    modifyNth f n.succ (a :: l) = a :: modifyNth f n l := rfl
```
or should we use `n + 1`?
Yes, ok the surrounding text uses n+1, so I'll change that
I would consider giving all arguments explicit types, even if lean can infer them
